Title: ExtendedStream
Description: This is a Library that helps users of it to simply access streams and control them.
HomeWiki:
This is a Library that helps users of it to simply access streams and control them.
Controls like safe read , add header to a stream, make sub stream of an stream, merge streams,and...

there is a solution for slicing a stream to fixed size streams too.

Any idea about streams appreciated. With your help this project can be useful.
